children.name: according
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: thyself
children.sourceText: Nay; Lord, show thyself unto me.

children.name: a
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: about
children.sourceText: O Lord, thou hast said that we must be encompassed about by the floods.

children.name: across
children.sourceText: O Lord, look upon me in pity, and turn away thine anger from this thy people, and suffer not that they shall go forth across this raging deep in darkness; but behold these things which I have molten out of the rock.

children.name: all
children.sourceText: And I know, O Lord, that thou hast all power, and can do whatsoever thou wilt for the benefit of man; therefore touch these stones, O Lord, with thy finger, and prepare them that they may shine forth in darkness; and they shall shine forth unto us in the vessels which we have prepared, that we may have light while we shall cross the sea.

children.name: among
children.sourceText: Choose ye out from among our sons a king, even whom ye will.

children.name: and
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: as
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: because
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: before
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: but
children.sourceText: O Lord, look upon me in pity, and turn away thine anger from this thy people, and suffer not that they shall go forth across this raging deep in darkness; but behold these things which I have molten out of the rock.

children.name: by
children.sourceText: O Lord, thou hast said that we must be encompassed about by the floods.

children.name: can
children.sourceText: And I know, O Lord, that thou hast all power, and can do whatsoever thou wilt for the benefit of man; therefore touch these stones, O Lord, with thy finger, and prepare them that they may shine forth in darkness; and they shall shine forth unto us in the vessels which we have prepared, that we may have light while we shall cross the sea.

children.name: down
children.sourceText: Let us gather together our people that we may number them, that we may know of them what they will desire of us before we go down to our graves.

children.name: for
children.sourceText: And also we shall perish, for in them we cannot breathe, save it is the air which is in them; therefore we shall perish.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: I saw the finger of the Lord, and I feared lest he should smite me; for I knew not that the Lord had flesh and blood.

children.name: his
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: I
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: in
children.sourceText: And behold, O Lord, in them there is no light; whither shall we steer?

children.name: into
children.sourceText: Surely this thing leadeth into captivity.

children.name: it
children.sourceText: And also we shall perish, for in them we cannot breathe, save it is the air which is in them; therefore we shall perish.

children.name: lest
children.sourceText: I saw the finger of the Lord, and I feared lest he should smite me; for I knew not that the Lord had flesh and blood.

children.name: many
children.sourceText: Behold, O Lord, thou hast smitten us because of our iniquity, and hast driven us forth, and for these many years we have been in the wilderness; nevertheless, thou hast been merciful unto us.

children.name: may
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: me
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: must
children.sourceText: O Lord, thou hast said that we must be encompassed about by the floods.

children.name: my
children.sourceText: O Lord, behold I have done even as thou hast commanded me; and I have prepared the vessels for my people, and behold there is no light in them.

children.name: nevertheless
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: o
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: save
children.sourceText: And also we shall perish, for in them we cannot breathe, save it is the air which is in them; therefore we shall perish.

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: And behold, O Lord, in them there is no light; whither shall we steer?

children.name: should
children.sourceText: I saw the finger of the Lord, and I feared lest he should smite me; for I knew not that the Lord had flesh and blood.

children.name: that
children.sourceText: Behold, O Lord, wilt thou suffer that we shall cross this great water in darkness?

children.name: the
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: thee
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: them
children.sourceText: And behold, O Lord, in them there is no light; whither shall we steer?

children.name: there

children.sourceText: Behold, O Lord, wilt thou suffer that we shall cross this great water in darkness?

children.sourceText: And behold, O Lord, in them there is no light; whither shall we steer?

children.name: what

children.name: which
children.sourceText: O Lord, I have performed the work which thou hast commanded me, and I have made the barges according as thou hast directed me.

children.name: while
children.sourceText: And I know, O Lord, that thou hast all power, and can do whatsoever thou wilt for the benefit of man; therefore touch these stones, O Lord, with thy finger, and prepare them that they may shine forth in darkness; and they shall shine forth unto us in the vessels which we have prepared, that we may have light while we shall cross the sea.

children.name: whom
children.sourceText: Choose ye out from among our sons a king, even whom ye will.

children.name: will
children.sourceText: Let us gather together our people that we may number them, that we may know of them what they will desire of us before we go down to our graves.

children.name: with
children.sourceText: Now behold, O Lord, and do not be angry with thy servant because of his weakness before thee; for we know that thou art holy and dwellest in the heavens, and that we are unworthy before thee; because of the fall our natures have become evil continually; nevertheless, O Lord, thou hast given us a commandment that we must call upon thee, that from thee we may receive according to our desires.

children.name: ye
children.sourceText: Choose ye out from among our sons a king, even whom ye will.

children.name: yea
children.sourceText: Yea, Lord, I know that thou speakest the truth, for thou art a God of truth, and canst not lie.
